summary: Extensive reference pictures for Halofarm's poser mods
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/h3voT0Bl.jpg[/IMG][/center]


_Description :
As the title says, it's an extensive reference album for all Halofarm's pose mods so far. I made this because as far as I know a complete one doesn't exist.
It includes : action poser, dramatic poser, Halo poser (1&2), other idles (1&2), pair poses, pinup ex (1-5), pinup for males, SNSD and standing poses (1-3). 1000+ pictures in total.

_How to use :
1. Extract the archive wherever you want
2. Go into the "Poser Extensive Chart Album" folder
3. Click on index.html
4. Enjoy
author: MisterGibson
